Mr# C# Gregory Van Camp, Director
Educational Broadcasting
West Virginia University
Morgantown, West Virginia
Dear Hr. Van Camp:
As a nominee, you are undoubtedly interested in the results of our
recent election# Elected to the Board of Directors as the Director of
the Institutional Affiliates was Janes Peterson of Florida Atlantic
University. Mr. Peterson will serve on the Board until December 31, 19&>*
We appreciate your willingness to be a candidate for this office# You
can be sure that, as an Institutional Affiliate, Bill Harley and X
will call on you for assistance in the future#
If we can ever be of assistance to you or your institution, please do
not hesitate to get in touch with us#
Cordially,
Harold E. Hill
MUi/kfc
